text: aur hamane apanee pharamaabaradaaree kee haalat mein duniya se utha le aur phiraun kee qaum ke chand saradaaron ne (phiraun) se kaha ki kya aap moosa aur usakee qaum ko unakee haalat par chhod denge ki mulk mein fasaad karate phire aur aapake aur aapake khudaon (kee parasatish) ko chhod baithen- phiraun kahane laga (tum ghabarao nahin) ham anaqareeb hee unake beton kee qatl karate hain aur unakee auraton ko (laundiyo banaane ke vaaste) jinda rakhate hain aur ham to un par har tarah qaaboo rakhate hain
